summary: "Seven Samurai," a 1954 Japanese film by Akira Kurosawa, tells a story set in 1586. Desperate farmers hire samurai to protect their harvest from bandits. The movie was very expensive and took a year to make. It's considered one of the best films ever, ranking high in many critics' lists. People love it so much that it's been remade and referenced many times.
title: Seven Samurai
